title: WarZone: Hybrid Orchestral Dramatic Music, Pack1
description: Top-quality Hybrid Orchestral Music Themes for adventurous and action games
longDescription:
AUDIO DEMO - Looping themes (Each theme is looped once to show the looping junction)

AUDIO DEMO - Full Themes (No-Looping)


Introducing "WarZone: Hybrid Orchestral Dramatic Music, Pack1'' that contains looping and non-looping cinematic orchestral music themes made for adventurous and action-packed games.


If you are looking for original, pristine, and professional-standard music tracks for your projects, this asset might interest you.


HIGHLIGHTS:


1-Composed, produced, and mastered by us.

2-RME FIREFACE UFX+ is used as the audio interface to ensure the highest quality.

3-The asset contains tracks in 48kHz & 44.1kHz (24-bit) specs.

4-Both looping and non-looping masters are included.

5-All rhythmic tracks are produced in the same musical key, thus allowing game developers to give the soundscape a cohesive appeal.

6-Royalty-free audio. Use in multiple projects.


Music Styles:

Dramatic, Hybrid, Orchestral


Music Suitability:

Suitable for contents featuring War, Battlefield, Combat, Fight, drama, aggression, and action


Feel free to reach out to me at shashirajproductions@gmail.com for any concerns.
technicalDetails:
